summary: This is an ESP that fixes some issues with Reaper\'s Ebony Crossbow mod. (Even though is says 0kb there is a file!)
descriptionHtml:
Hello. This is my first file uploaded ever! 
You still need the original textures and meshes from Reaper\'s mod, so go and download it from here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22130
Total changes:
-Corrected the model for the projectile. Now it is indeed the black as night ebony bolt.
-Corrected the name for the projectile as you pick it up from \"Daedric Bolt\" to \"Ebony Bolt\"
-Added exploding bolts of fire, shock and ice to compete with the vanilla ones. Still, these have the dwarven equivalent enhancement dealing 15 points of damage the corresponding element.
-Added recipes for the aforementioned bolts, requiring the basic ingredients plus salts(Fire for Fire, Frost for Frost, Void for Shock).
-Added an Enhanced version of the Crossbow with the ignore armor perk, but I need some feedback to determine whether or not it works.

To install:
Manually: Simply drag and drop the ESP in your data folder, AFTER you have installed Reaper\'s Original mod, overwriting his old ESP.
NMM: Install Reaper\'s mod first, then this. When you are prompted for the overwriting of a file choose \"Yes to all\".

I\'m also open for any suggestions and tweaking of the above values. 

All credits should go to Reaper9111 for his original mod.
author: Reaper9111
